content: GoldForum in partnership with YOUHODLER presents to you a new CryptoQuiz Challenge.How to Participate [GUIDE] 1) Sign up for Gold.Forum, Have an account? Just log in.2) Signup for YouHodler. Then verify your account (KYC - ID).3) Post the answer to the current quiz to enter the lucky draw. 4) Answer previous quizzes & do tasks to earn points and win big prizes.Prizes: - 7 lucky draws of three money prizes: $25, $15, and $10 every 3 days, paid in Crypto. [Total: $350]Based on the number of points at the contest's final, 7 prizes: Â - $300, $200, $100 + 4x$50. [Total: $800]More crypto rewards in your YouHodler account.You can check out full details, rules, and questions about the contest here : https://gold.forum/topic/388073-cryptoquiz-contest-1150-in-prizes-sponsored-by-youhodler
